pages.title: Ares Fragment
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 4 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Flips a weighted coin multiple times. Increases or decreases damage depending on result. $(br)Consumes durability

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Vanilla crits deal more damage
